plays.text: Penalty to Petr Nedved 2 minutes for Boarding Michael Nylander
Penalty to Jason Strudwick 2 minutes for Interference Mike Knuble
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Martin Straka AND Fedor Tyutin
Penalty to Turner Stevenson 2 minutes for Hooking Darius Kasparaitis
Penalty to Brian Savage 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for Hooking Freddy Meyer
Penalty to Randy Jones 2 minutes for Hooking Jaromir Jagr
Goal scored by Martin Rucinsky assisted by Petr Sykora AND Jason Ward
Goal scored by Joni Pitkanen assisted by Sami Kapanen AND Michal Handzus
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Tripping Donald Brashear
Goal scored by Mike Richards assisted by Freddy Meyer AND Brian Savage
Goal scored by Joni Pitkanen assisted by Mike Knuble AND Petr Nedved
